-- Megatron --

Megatron's internal repairs had fixed his right eye enough so that 
he could see out of it with about 85% efficiency.

"Megatron, TERRORIZE!" He transforms, and covers his head with his 
arms as two pulse laser blasts eat away at his chest and arm plates, 
and a plasma charge catches him in the left thigh.

"Grrr, you will pay..." He hits the ground, weapons armed and locked 
on Hot Rod.

"Die," He says as he fires two plasma blasts and two rockets at Hot 
Rod.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Kup/Hot Rod::
> 
> Kup was about to continue shooting at Quickstrike, when Megatron 
came at him. Kup aimed right at him, and opened fire with rapid 
plasma charges.
> 
> Hot Rod who was next  to Kup also fired. Four photon lasers, and 
three plasma charges, headed towards Megatron.
